welcome:
Hi {user_mention}\! Welcome to the AI Notebook Bot\.

*Here's how to get started:*
1\. Create a project with `/newproject <your topic of study>`\.
2\. Upload your own `.pdf` or `.txt` files, or use `/discover` to find sources automatically\.
3\. Ask questions, or generate content with `/podcast` and `/mindmap`\!

Use /help to see all commands\.
help:
*Available Commands:*
`/newproject <topic>` \- Creates a new project based on a topic\.
`/discover` \- Automatically finds and adds web sources to your project\.
`/listprojects` \- Shows all your projects\.
`/switchproject <name>` \- Switches to an existing project\.
`/podcast [topic]` \- Generates a podcast\. If no topic is given, uses the main project topic\.
`/mindmap [topic]` \- Generates a mind map\. If no topic is given, uses the main project topic\.
`/lang <en|ru|de>` \- Sets the response language\.
`/status` \- Checks your current project, topic, and language\.
